testcase.name: SleepActionIT
testcase.description:
This test shows how to make the whole Citrus test run sleep for a given amount of time. The service bean "waitDelay" offers the property delay, to define the amount of time in seconds.
As shown in this example decimal values are supported to specify the time to wait. The bean can also be used without defining a custom delay. In this case the default delay of 5 secinds will be used.
